resources.string: An error has occurred. Please try again.
In a small town in Maine, seven children known as The Losers Club come face to face with life problems, bullies and a monster that takes the shape of a clown called Pennywise.

Skarsgård goes to hell and back to craft a truly malevolent creation, utterly believable as the black soul of King’s cursed small town...Read the full review here: http://screen-space.squarespace.com/reviews/2017/9/6/it.html","url":"https://www.themoviedb.org/review/59afaa2cc3a3682e6401064f
热门电影（按欢迎度排序）
